entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
